thoughts: Feels lost without the support of their Clan behind them
Wonders if their deputy has already become leader
Hopes that the Clan is doing okay without them
Feels like they have failed their Clan
Is wondering if StarClan is still able to contact them
Hopes their deputy can carry on in their absence
Wonders if their clan is missing them as much as they miss their clan
Feels like they worked so hard for nothing
